content:
I can't believe Parade Station made a custom broadcast for us!
For someone like me who's only heard about them,
this is so exciting!

I can't believe Astralink is collaborating with Parade Station!
This is my first time
actually watching their show, and it's amazing.

{me}, did you hear Tata Lala's broadcast announcement?
What a fun way to make announcements,
Childlike wonder really is a universal language.
